subject: Entrepreneurship
title: Vera Wang: Fashion Designer at 40
description: A short lesson to help you apply Vera Wang: Fashion Designer at 40.

hook.text: Vera Wang didn't design her first dress until age 40. She couldn't find a wedding gown she liked.

buildup.text: A former figure skater and Vogue editor, she had zero fashion design training.

discovery.text: She designed her own wedding dress, then realized other women wanted the same modern elegance.

twist.text: The fashion industry dismissed a 40-year-old newcomer. She didn't need their permission.

climax.text: Vera Wang became the most iconic bridal brand in history. Celebrity weddings made her name global.

punchline.text: It's never too late to become what you were always meant to be.

quiz.question: What triggered Vera Wang's career in fashion design?
options: She couldn't find a wedding gown she liked and designed her own
She was recruited by a major fashion house
She won a design competition in her 30s
